Oh hello Link! What have you been up to?
Oh that is nice! Say hello to him for me, will you? Ah, she's in the area to the west, you'll find her outside or in the third house. Well then, if that's the case, I'm going to give you a very long and elaborate answer to your question, so that The Doglion can test the dialog feature a bit more.
Bye Link!
What now?
I said she is in the map to THE WEST! You dumbass! Oh well, I suppose that's YOUR problem. BLOW IT OUT YOUR ASS!
Ciao...
Peach 1 140 392 1
